organisation: Autonomous Intelligent Robotics Group, Binghamton University

Tuned navigation parameters (costmaps, inflation radius, recovery behaviors) to improve reliability in dynamic environments.

Assisted in backend development of multiple applications using Java and Spring Boot, implementing small service-layer updates, input validations, and minor bug fixes in REST APIs under senior developer supervision.
Supported frontend development using React and Tailwind CSS, building and modifying reusable UI components, fixing layout and responsiveness issues, and integrating components with backend APIs.
